subject: Economy
question_en: What is the definition of demand?
A_en: Increase in the quantity of goods and services demanded by consumers.
A_hi: भ्रांख को उम्मेदार में किसी और सहित उपयोग और उपयोग के विभिन्नता क्या है ?
B_en: Increase in the quantity of goods and services supplied by producers.
C_en: Increase in the price of goods and services.
D_en: Decrease in the quantity of goods and services demanded by consumers.
D_hi: मूल्यको संखलन और उपयोगी क्या है ?
E_en: Increase in the price of goods and services.
F_en: Decrease in the quantity of goods and services supplied by producers.
option_en_1: Increase in the quantity of goods and services demanded by consumers.
option_en_2: Decrease in the quantity of goods and services demanded by consumers.
option_en_3: Increase in the price of goods and services.
option_en_4: Decrease in the price of goods and services.
option_en_5: Increase in the quantity of goods and services supplied by producers.
option_en_6: Decrease in the quantity of goods and services supplied by producers.
option_en_7: Increase in the price of goods and services.
option_en_8: Decrease in the price of goods and services.
option_en_9: Increase in the quantity of goods and services supplied by producers.
option_en_10: Decrease in the quantity of goods and services supplied by producers.
